headline: Is Huntington Bancshares (HBAN) Offering Value After Recent Share Price Strength
summary: If you are wondering whether Huntington Bancshares is fairly priced or offering value right now, the starting point is understanding how its current share price lines up with different valuation checks. The stock last closed at US$18.02, with returns of 0.7% over 7 days, 1.9% over 30 days, 3.1% year to date and 10.0%, 40.2% and 66.9% over 1, 3 and 5 years respectively. Recent coverage has focused on how regional banks are being assessed on balance sheet strength, interest rate sensitivity...
